column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH: ------On March 30 the Ministry of Economy and Finance o issued a statement stating that export sales of white rice would be temporarily suspended. .------The recommendation is to ensure a sustainable supply of rice in the country during the COVID-19. The export suspension of rice starts on April 5 2020
column4: until further notice.------Fragrant (*jasmine?) rice exports appear to be unaffected.------ NKD------*Vietnam
column5: the world’s 3rd largest rice supplier imposed similar measures last week.
